author: Rick Spilman
content: Thanks to all for the well wishes. I appreciate it.

author: Irwin Bryan
content: Thanks for inviting us to your 34th wedding anniversary, congratulations, and thanks for the boogieing beluga!

author: Willy
content:
To think if the whale flopped around in the water. The wedding would have become very wet.

Congrats on your milestone Rick.

author: Peter Wright
content:
Happy Anniversary to you and your good lady Rick, it is so heartwarming to hear that you have reached another milestone in these troubled times. May you have many more.

And many thanks for something that lifts the spirits, whilst all the other news is dispiriting but essential, we need good news as well.

Thankyou.

Pete/.
